attributes.action: Allow non contact sports that are played outside such as golf and fishing open
attributes.additional_details: please allow these non contact type of sports back open. people need something to do, such as parents with children stuck at home and old age pensioners, and people already retired. Sports like fishing and golf can easily be opened back up and social distancing rules met. Our people need this type of release now and get in the great outdoors, even if you can only participate on your own or with family members that would be something.
attributes.background: We should allow non contact sports that are played outdoors such as golf and fishing to be back open providing social distancing rules are adhered to, we believe that several people would benefit across the uk, especially those that are suffering with mental health problems, OAPs and children.
